Most Illustrious Sir

Acknowledging the receipt of the letters Your Lordship 14 and 15 of the current month, I must in response say to you, regarding the first, that I am certain Your Lordship Faria Faria, to whom I ordered the fulfillment of the orders conveyed in them, and regarding the second, with the orders to Rafael Teixeira Marins and to Captain Joaquim Gomes de Araújo, your requisition concerning the goods purchased from the latter is satisfied.

God keep Your Lordship  
Secretariat of the Treasury Affairs in Piratini, January 19, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Worthy Commander of the Right Division.
